title: DURA Output Schema
description: Defines the structure of dependency risk analysis results returned by the DURA Actor.

name.description: The name of the npm package being analyzed.

currentVersion.description: Version range specified in the target repository's package.json.

latestVersion.description: Latest version available on the npm registry.

diff.description: Semantic version difference between current and latest version.

repoUrl.description: GitHub repository of the dependency, if detected.

breaking.description: Whether release notes for the dependency contain breaking change indicators.

breakingKeywords.description: List of matched breaking change keywords from GitHub releases.

releaseNotesSnippet.description: First 500 characters of extracted release notes used in analysis.
